pages.text: The $(item)Pump$() uses Zaps to collect fluid in an area.$(br2)You can extract Fluid from the Pump using $(l:ftbic:items/fluid_cell)Fluid Cells$(), Buckets, or using fluid pipes from another mod.

Without $(l:ftbic:items/upgrades)upgrades$(), it accepts only up to HV current.$(br2)By default, the Pump drains a 7x7 area, all the way down to the bottom of the pool. You can extend this area with $(l:ftbic:machines/quarry#landmarks)Landmarks$().
